p.font: We are committed to ensuring the quality of your purchase; we stand behind everything that we sell and warrant that all items will be free from any manufacturing defects at the time of delivery. We will repair and maintain your jewelry for a lifetime. This warranty does not apply to our collection of Pre-owned, estate and vintage jewelry, since these pieces were not manufactured by Darakjian.

p.style: font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; line-height: 27px; text-align: justify;
p.font: All of our jewelry is manufactured using the highest quality materials and is inspected prior to shipment. Our lifetime warranty offers free prong tightening, re-polishing, rhodium plating and cleaning services. Please note that slight irregularities and variations in craftsmanship or natural characteristics, or internal inclusions, visible or otherwise, in colored gemstones are unique and individual to each item. These characteristics are considered as part of the character of the item, and should not be considered a defect.

div.p: At Darakjian Jewelers, we take great pride in our exquisite collection of diamonds, jewelry, and watches. Therefore, we proudly offer complimentary cleaning and inspection of the pieces you own. This service will be completed thoroughly by our own on-site jeweler while you wait. We extend friendly reminders; offer scheduled appointments or just a welcome visit into our showroom to provide you the immediate assistance you may need.

p.style: font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; line-height: 27px; text-align: justify;

div.p: We recommend having your diamond ring cleaned and inspected every three months or if it undergoes any potential trauma. Inspections may help prevent the loss of a stone and extend the life of your jewelry. This cleaning and inspection service is free of charge to all Darakjian customers on their Darakjian jewelry. The customer only pays for shipping, and Darakjian pays for return shipping. Repairs to your ring mounting can also be done at this time at cost.

div.p: The foregoing Manufacturer Warranty and Complimentary Services are available only to the person who purchased the covered product from Darakjian.

p.style: font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; line-height: 27px; text-align: justify;

div.p: Maintenance, repair, sizing or other service performed by someone other than Darakjian will void your Manufacturer Warranty.

p.style: font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; line-height: 27px; text-align: justify;

div.p: Fine jewelry is not impervious to normal wear, activities or trauma. This is particularly true for rings since hands are regularly subjected to considerable abuse. We do not provide warranties for damage due to normal wear, product loss, loss of stones or theft. Damage or loss that results from failure to obtain repairs necessary to maintain the integrity of the product is also not covered.

p.style: font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; line-height: 27px; text-align: justify;

div.p: Some examples of common jewelry issues that would not be considered manufacturing defects include:

p.style: font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; line-height: 27px; text-align: justify;

div.p: • Discoloration due to exposure to chemicals, make-up, swimming pools, hot tubs or bathing.

p.style: font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; line-height: 27px; text-align: justify;

div.p: • Prongs and precious metals, in general, wear over time and may require “building up” or restoration work as normal wear.

p.style: font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; line-height: 27px; text-align: justify;

div.p: • Bent, caught or worn out prongs(s) allowing a stone to fall out or be lost due to normal wear or other damage.

p.style: font-family: Poppins, sans-serif; line-height: 27px; text-align: justify;

div.p: • Lost stone or a stone has fallen out due to chipping or breaking caused by normal wear or other damage.
Stop into Darakjian Jewelers at any time and we will clean your jewelry at your request, making each item look and feel like the first time that you wore it.
